record.title: PERMISSION TO REDUCE TIME FOR ELECTRONIC VOTING DURING FURTHER CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 2419
record.narrative:
PERMISSION TO REDUCE TIME FOR ELECTRONIC VOTING DURING FURTHER CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 2419 -- (House of Representatives - July 27, 2007)

[Page: H8769]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Chairman, I ask unanimous consent that, during further consideration of H.R. 2419 pursuant to House Resolution 574, the Chair may reduce to 2 minutes the minimum time for electronic voting under clause 6 of rule XVIII and clauses 8 and 9 of rule XX.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Minnesota?
